item.title: Need help compile error
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

[quote="$ Teza La Os $, post:5, topic:172542"][quote author=leetzone link=topic=232710.msg1990987#msg1990987 date=1200100223]
Teza La os? yu talking crap
Replace that with this

public void scEmote() { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14088) { //Magic Skill Cape stillgfx(409, absY, absX); stillgfx(498, absY, absX); stillgfx(497, absY, absX); txt4 = "Farcast em wit Barrage! ! 100 mage!."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } } public void chatlog() { Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar(); int hour24 = cal.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY); // 0..23 int min = cal.get(Calendar.MINUTE); // 0..59 int sec = cal.get(Calendar.SECOND); // 0..59 BufferedWriter bww = null;
you missed a bracket

[/quote]
-.- think your so smart… I may be a noob and talk crap but i no more than u[/quote]

[quote="$ Teza La Os $, post:2, topic:172542"]Hmm, So your basicly putting a grapic on the cape… and making it so you can farcast?
Why not try and remove the farcast… and have 1 gfx not 3…[/quote]

Yes very smarter then me and THAT post makes it true?
Where do you see hes making it to farcast?
txt4 = "farcast em with barrage’’; ???
That means the player is shouting that yes very very your such smarter then me
How can he remove the farcast when there is no??
Why 1 Gfx not 3??
HE JUST MISSED A BRACKET
